user.biography:
Break the Rules. 
Drink the Wine.
Old world style, new world finesse made in CA & NZ by Robin McBride & Andréa McBride John
Must be 21+ to follow

node.text:
Our new Reserve Wines are here. We’re breaking the rules with these special wines. Our Reserve Chardonnay ‘The Great Escape’ and our Reserve Pinot Noir ‘Cocky Motherf*cker’ are available now in a set for our Reserves Virtual Wine Tasting in June. 

These are very limited production wines and you’ll receive your invitation to the Virtual Tasting when you order the set. Link in bio to shop & learn the stories behind the labels 🍷

node.title: Join us for our Reserves Virtual Tasting in June

node.text:
Robin and Andréa unveil the first two wines from their Reserve Wines that come from the Santa Lucia Highlands in Monterey, California. 

Join us for a Reserves Virtual Tasting in June when you purchase the virtual tasting set of our Reserve Chardonnay and Reserve Pinot Noir available now at the link in bio 🍷

node.title: McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Wine Launch!!

node.text: Have you been an ‘ABC’ girl before? Learn about Andréa’s wow wine, the Chardonnay grape and more on our free McBride Certified Wine 101 Facebook course. Link in bio to join the community & watch the full Chardonnay video. Celebrate #NationalChardonnayDay with us 🥂

node.text:
As harvest continues in the Southern Hemisphere, we're chatting with good friend & certified game changer Marian Leitner-Waldman, CEO & Co-Founder of @archerroosewines — a wine brand that serves up wordly, delicious, high quality wines only in alternative packaging.

We're sipping on our Sauvignon Blanc's today to discuss the @shecanwines New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc & Archer Roose Chilean Sauvignon Blanc to demystify the wine in a can movement! Watch the full happy hour & read more about Marian on the blog, link in bio 🥂#SauvignonBlanc

node.title: Archer Roose Wines x SHE CAN Wines Founders Happy Hour

node.text:
Calling all entrepreneurs ☎️ Andréa went live this week with @prettypensive the Co-Founder of @mentedcosmetics for their 4th Anniversary Live Series! 

They are taking the month of January to celebrate Black women & make sure every voice is heard. Watch the full video on the @mentedcosmetics account - but here’s a taste of the story behind our @mcbridesisters brand! Be sure to follow them & Amanda, they are pioneers of the beauty industry! Cheers to #womenownedbusinesses 🥂🥂

node.text:
Join us for our 8 module wine course to learn more about the grape varietals you love, how to choose the crowd pleaser off the wine list and so much more! 

Get on your way to becoming #McBrideCertified at Facebook.com/groups/McBrideCertified or click the link in our bio 🍷🍇

node.text:
A very happy holiday season with a lot to celebrate! 

If you weren’t able to tune in, we talked about our Feast inspiration Madam CJ Walker, and shot our Holiday campaign in her New York Mansion. Also, our new holiday gift sets releasing at 11am PST this Black Friday and our new @blackgirlmagicwines Merlot & Zinfandel! So many exciting releases and so much to celebrate. Because we’ve made it. In style. 

Join us to kick off #TheNewBlackFriday at 11am PST on 11/27! Cheers 🥂

node.title: The Feast & Our Limited Edition Holiday Releases!

node.text: #HappyLaborDay! While we pop corks and pour glasses to enjoy our 3-day weekend, we hope you're taking some time today to celebrate with friends and family, as well as celebrating yourself in the moment. Living your best life with a glass of #McBrideSisters Sparkling Brut Rosé by your side like @ea_bydesignevents and @chefteshia!

node.text:
Game changer, science enthusiast, mother, vintner, sister 🍇 ⠀
⠀
These are just some of the keywords you'll find in the new blog post written by our President and 1/2 of the McBride Sisters, Robin McBride! From her inspirations to her love for Oakland, click the #linkinbio to read more about her passion for women's empowerment and the exact moment that wine grabbed her heart and got her hooked!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Robin & Andréa on September 02, 2021. May be an image of nature.

node.text:
The Escolle Vineyard, where we hand selected rows of grapes for our Reserve Wines — grown sustainably in the Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey County. The proximity to the ocean, sandy loam soil and warm California sunshine give our Reserve Chardonnay & Reserve Pinot Noir the qualities we love the most. ⠀
⠀
Have you tasted our McBride Sisters Collection Reserve Wines yet? Taste both in our California Reserve Gift Set available at the link in bio 🍷⠀
⠀
📸 courtesy of @caracciolicellars

node.text:
A refreshing twist on a classic — Our McBride Sisters Oakland 75 is here to become the next cocktail in your happy hour rotation! This #BlackGirlMagicWines remix on the French 75 tastes as good as it looks. Link in bio to shop the Sparkling Brut in time for the long weekend!

#explorepage #BlackGirlMagicWines #blackownedbusiness #wine #cocktails #winecocktails #winedrinking #happyhour #womenownedbusiness #cocktailrecipes

clips_music_attribution_info.should_mute_audio_reason: Instagram music isn't available in your region.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Robin & Andréa on August 28, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and flower.

node.text:
FAM! It's time to grab your Oakland 75 wine cocktail, McBride Sisters Collection, The Reserves, McBride Sisters Black Girl Magic, SHE CAN wine or spritzer, whatever is your go-to, and raise a glass to CELEBRATE my big SISSY’s, the 1st McBride Sister, her inaugural turn around the sun anniversary, let’s wish Robin a VERY Happy Birthday! 

I LOVE you so much, I’m so grateful, blessed, lucky that we found each other and never take it for granted. Screeching Happy Birthday (Stevie version of course) at the top of my/our lungs from me and the rest of the MSC Fam, Cheers!

Robin’s birthday wish is for donations to our McBride Sisters SHE CAN FUND - women supporting women is how we roll! You can donate directly to the Fund at the #linkinbio [the Donate button is located at the top of the page!]

May be an image of one or more people and outdoors.

node.text:
Cheers to #WomensEqualityDay! Today, I want to celebrate the passing of the 19th Amendment and shine a light to something near to my heart - the SHE CAN Fund. ⠀
⠀
Our SHE CAN Fund was created to aid in closing the gender and wage gap in leadership positions in male-dominated fields. With the SHE CAN Fund, I want women to feel empowered, to take up space, to be leaders and game-changers by providing grants and scholarships to achieve their goals. You can donate directly to our SHE CAN Fund at the #linkinbio —the Donate button is located at the top of the page! Xoxo, Robin

node.text:
In preparation for my birthday I've put together a playlist of all my favorite songs — from Bossa Nova to Lizzo, grab a glass & catch a vibe! ⠀
⠀
Click the link in our bio or swipe up on our story for my Birthday Playlist on @spotify 🎶

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Robin & Andréa on August 24, 2021. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
Celebrate with me! It's my birthday week, 4 Days and counting, so I'm ready to kick it off with a twist on one of my favorite cocktails – The Oakland 75, a McBride Sisters delicious remix on the French 75!

3 ounces of McBride Sisters Sparkling Brut Rosé or @blackgirlmagicwines Sparkling Brut
1 ounce gin
1/2 ounce lemon juice freshly squeezed
1/2 ounce simple syrup

Garnish: Lemon twist & a sprig of rosemary

If you want to celebrate with me, I created a special code for you to use: ROBINSBDAY for $15 Ground Shipping if you purchase 4+ of my Sparkling favorites, our Sparkling Brut Rosé and our #BlackGirlMagicWines Sparkling Brut, which you can find at the link in the bio! 

Raise a glass with me and let's get this party started!
Cheers – Robin

node.text:
We came as friends and are leaving as family! Celebrating wine and culinary Black excellence at the breathtaking Salamander Resort has been an experience we’ll never forget. We fed our souls and honored the Black and Brown cooking traditions that have shaped American Cuisine.

Thank you @chefkwameonwuachi  @officialsheilajohnson and @foodandwine for giving us space to be part of this event. We have more to share from our experience, so be on the lookout!

user.full_name: A N D R E   F O W L E S  🇯🇲🇺🇸

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Robin & Andréa on August 21, 2021. May be an image of outdoors.

node.text:
Today we sat down with the leading Black sommeliers and Women In Wine to taste our Reserve Wines, to tell the story of the vineyards, and to share these wines that are so close to our hearts with the women who are also shaking up this industry! 🍷

For #TheFamilyReunion we’ve listened, learned, feasted, and now… we party! It's day 3 and we’re heading into the Block Party to taste more of the delicious creations that remind us home, take us to a place where our culture is rooted, and enjoy the company of new friends.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Robin & Andréa on August 21, 2021. May be an image of tree, nature, sky, grass and twilight.
Photo by Robin & Andréa on August 21, 2021. May be an image of 2 people and outdoors.
Photo by Robin & Andréa on August 20, 2021.

node.text:
Today was so special! It’s called #TheFamilyReunion for a reason. We’re surrounded by a family of game-changers with great taste! Our Day 2 was full of education, good food, WINE, and even some surprises (we’re talkin’ about you @davechappelle!)

The African Night Market was truly outstanding and we couldn't be more proud to be a part of this event. We can't wait to see what tomorrow holds but we know you’ve got more amazing plans @chefkwameonwuachi and @officialsheilajohnson! You both really created something powerful. We’ll be dreaming about this Sauvignon Blanc & Jerk Chicken pairing!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Robin & Andréa on August 20, 2021.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Robin & Andréa on August 19, 2021 tagging @mcbridesisters, and @shecanwines. May be an image of 1 person, drink and outdoors.

node.text:
Today is the day! Kick-off event for #TheFamilyReunion with @chefkwameonwuachi and @foodandwine is going strong and the vibes are RIGHT. We got our @shecanwines Fresh White in hand– sipping and enjoying the company of so many brilliant minds in one place.

 #McBrideSisters and @blackgirlmagicwines will be flowing nonstop over the next 3 days and we can't wait to share it with the fam. Be sure to follow along on our stories to catch some of your favorites all weekend long!
